data.text: Baba na anyigba si le Kus ƒe tɔsisiwo
dukɔ si dɔa amewo ɖona ɖe atsiaƒu
Mi xexea me nɔlawo katã kple anyigbadzitɔwo,
“Manɔ anyi kpoo anɔ nu kpɔm tso nɔnyeƒe
Elabena hafi nuŋeɣi nava yi ne seƒoƒowo hã nava yi,
Woagblẽ wo katã ɖi na to dzi xe ƒonuwo
Ɣe ma ɣi la, dukɔ si dzɔ atsu ƒlalu, eye eŋu zrɔ̃ dredredre,
